name: Coleman Foley
body:
Hi, I'm Coleman. I've been living on the web for a long time. Now I'm ready to start making it.

I made [Playlist Me](http://playlist-me.meteor.com) -- it's Quora for music recommendations.

I've been blogging about my experiences learning to program on my blog on Quora. Here are a couple of my favorite posts: [Event-driven Programming with Socket.io](http://colemanfoley.tumblr.com/post/47397895792/event-driven-programming-with-socket-io) and [Zooming In and Out](http://colemanfoley.tumblr.com/post/47397895792/event-driven-programming-with-socket-io).

[Email](colemanfoley@gmail.com) is the best way to contact me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
